NO_MATCH_WITH_INPUT: No match found with this input data
EMAIL_MSG: Please activate your account. The verification code to activate account is:
PASSWORD_ALREADY_SET: You have already set password, please login with that
NO_MATCH_WITH_EMAIL_OR_NAME: No match found with name or email
JWT_TOKEN_ERROR: JWT token seems malfunctioned, requested user not found
TOKEN_NOT_FOUND: JWT token not found in req, please send JWT token
NOT_ALLOWED: User is not allowed to give training right now
TASK_ALREADY_EXISTS: The selected task number is already exist in task, please select another
UPLOAD_VIDEO: Please upload video first, then activate the training
NO_RELIABLE_USER: No reliable user has done any assessment
